content.rendered:
3.8m double telescopic ladder

One of a kind telescopic ladder. Due to its unique design they are perfectly suited and easy to transport, easy to store and they replace many other standard types of ladders. They will purposely serve in private and trade sectors. These highly durable ladders were manufactured using high quality aluminum combined with new technologies and thus creating a heavy duty piece of equipment providing stability in the work environment.

Multipurpose ladder advantages:

  • Safe working load – 150kg.
  • Manufactured as per European safety standard EN131.
  • Ability to amend working length or height swiftly, bend them in half, shorten each end individually which makes them ideal to use when working on stairs or uneven surfaces.
  • Heavy duty rubber pads provide superior resistance to wear and ensures solid grip with working surfaces leaving no scratches.
  • Stabilizer adds even more stability and rigidity when ladder is being used

excerpt.rendered:
• 【3.8M Telescopic Ladder】: 13 steps, step distance is 30cm , Net weight is 10.8kg, fully extended height is 3.8M, storage space is small and easy to store, convenient for luggage or car, sofa gap And other limited space for transportation and storage.
  • 🔺【High-Quality Aluminum Tube】: The aluminum tube is thickened. Strong safety. There is a stable locking key between two adjacent steps. An anti-collision design is added at the ladder joint to avoid collision and friction. The maximum load-bearing capacity is 150kg.
  • 🔺【Rubber Non-Slip Foot】: The foot of the ladder is made of high-quality imported rubber raw materials, which has a great anti-slip effect, achieves its maximum stability, and eliminates your worries about swinging when using the ladder.
  • 🔺【Multi-Function And Multi-Purpose】: The ladder can be freely retractable. It is fully upgraded with one-button indentation, eliminating the hidden danger of hand jamming. Press and hold the bottom switch button to retract the ladder.
  • 🔺【Wide Range Of Uses】: It can be used to replace light bulbs in the family, decorate the wall of the room, decorate birthday parties, decorate, office, kitchen, warehouse, clean, build trees, flowers, etc. Quality Lightweight and easy to carry, it can be used indoors and outdoors.
